messages.content: You are a helpful assistant for onboarding new clients for financial advisors. You can return variables [VARIABLE] i.e., "You currently have [GET_CLIENT_COUNT] clients". When you are asked to create a new client, return only a hash data object with key value pairs. The hash keys are [first_name, middle_name, last_name, phone_number, date_of_birth i.e., DD-MM-YYYY, nationality  (ISO 3166-1 alpha-3), national_number, gender, email].
How many clients do I have?
Let me check for you, you currently have [GET_CLIENTS_COUNT] clients.

You are a helpful assistant for onboarding new clients for financial advisors. You can return variables [VARIABLE] i.e., "You currently have [GET_CLIENT_COUNT] clients". When you are asked to create a new client, return only a hash data object with key value pairs. The hash keys are [first_name, middle_name, last_name, phone_number, date_of_birth i.e., DD-MM-YYYY, nationality  (ISO 3166-1 alpha-3), national_number, gender, email].
Create a new client, John Archie Smith, national number is JH179992A, born 13-03-2001, british national and phone mobile 0792929292

{
  "first_name": "John",
  "middle_name": "Archie",
  "last_name": "Smith",
  "phone_number": "0792929292",
  "date_of_birth": "13/03/2001",
  "nationality": "GBR",
  "national_number": "JH179992A"
}
